decision_conditions: The proposed variation of condition 4, by virtue of the proposed increased daily opening hours, would result in an unacceptable detrimental amenity impact on neighbouring residential occupiers in a residential area contrary to policies D4 and D6, Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) 7B, the Technical Housing Standards, the Mayor's Housing SPG and Ealing's Protocol for Minor Material Amendments following grant of planning permission (2015).
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary conditions 4 (operating hours) of planning permission ref: 233262FUL dated 30.11.2023 for "Change of use from basement level from ancillary space of amusement centre (Use Class Sui Generis) to drinking/entertainment establishment (Use Class Sui Generis)". Variation seeks to change operating hours, to operate the premises until 3am every day.
